entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -13.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -13.3°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -19.7°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
